text: Scarp may refer to: ==Landforms and geology== * Cliff, a significant vertical, or near vertical, rock exposure * Escarpment, a steep slope or long rock that occurs from erosion or faulting and separates two relatively level areas of differing elevations * Fault scarp, the topographic expression of faulting attributed to the displacement of the land surface by movement along faults ==Other== * Scarp, Scotland, an island in the Outer Hebrides of Scotland * Scarp and counterscarp, the inner and outer sides of a ditch or moat used in fortifications * SS-9 Scarp, the NATO reporting name for the R-36 ICBM * Scarp, a 2013 book by the British writer Nick Papadimitriou ==See also== * Scarpe (disambiguation)
title: Scarp
